*At 50*

_Joel, on his 50th birthday, sits back. He decides to look through his life. Whether he makes it to 50... your choice._

*Catherine is 48.* It certainly doesn't seem like she's getting older. She has been putting in a lot of effort, being better for Penny, these last few years. They've had more time alone. Joel and her have also had more time alone - and she hasn't changed in bed, either.

*Penny has reached 21.* She's a totally different person! Well, not totally... Cress is still with her, and Anna still around too, of course, reaching 14 or 15 this year. Joel doesn't remember. She's a well known artist, now. She seems happy.

*Kenny is 28, and Pam is 24.* They've just had their first child - well, two years ago. They had a son - and it seems they would like a daughter too. They seem happier than ever. Although Kenny seems to struggle with how serious his job is, he does it for his dad. Something he now only has just learnt.

*Amiya is 38, Shi being 46.* Amiya makes fun of Shi being old, knowing she's not far behind. Their two daughters have already married - Sylvie is only 22 but she seems so sure! They still all live together. Amiya is as carefree as ever. She finally seems like her normal self. 

*Nekoi is also 46. Who knows how old Time is...* But Nekoi is 46. She struggles a bit still, but seems happier now than ever. A good sign. Time keeps up with her. He has stopped time travelling. Where's the fun in that?

name: *No Cameras, Please*
desc:
BREAKING NEWS!

A shooting that has occurred within (X/Y) school, located nearby Reading, has officially been stopped with no casualties involved.

The shooter, a man named Benny Vargas, aged 35, was wearing a 'Team Flare' outfit whilst the shooting was occurring. Vargas has had many mental health issues in the past. Team Flare refuse to take responsibility of him, saying only that a statement will be released soon about him.

There were only two injuries during the event. One woman who asks to remain anonymous was overpowered and knocked out upon forced entry into the school. During this fight, she pressed the fire alarm button, causing the school to be evacuated.

Violett Thompson, the other injury, is a staff member at school, working as a Teacher's Assistant and also to help around the school with other problems. She was helping a student evacuate when the Vargas approached them.

Thompson is reported as seeing the shooter but staying calm, quickly evacuating the rest of the class she was helping that day. She then approached Vargas in an attempt to calm him down and held a conversation for over 5 minutes with him, but sustained three injuries in the process, two gunshots and one account of bodily harm that he did physically.

After attacking Thompson, Vargas started his search through the school, but the police had already arrived and pacified him before he could leave the room with Thompson in. She was rushed to ER immediately but is in a stable condition and is on the road to a full recovery.

'Violett truly risked her life for these children. She's done an incredible service for us all. We cannot thank her enough.' The school also says that there will be a commemoration of her and her duties.

The police only have an informal sentence to offer at this time : 'Benny is pending a sentence right now. The expected outcome is a life sentence under psychiatric monitoring. Without Violet, it's expected he would have made it much farther through the school. She is a hero.'

Violett Thompson is the mother of two daughters, both who attended the school at one point. It is believed her sister is the well-known Evelyn Thompson, but she is yet to say anything about the matter. We expect a statement from her in coming days.

name: *Theories*
desc:
This is less a story and more kinda lore:

*The Bioshock Infinite Theory*
So in Bioshock Infinite, you play as a guy named Booker. The universe is very complicated - so I‚Äôll spoil it all. The idea is, that Booker had a child named Anna, and also gambled a lot. In one universe, he sells Anna off to pay off the debt - in another, he keeps Anna. But he keeps wrestling to get Anna, sell Anna, etc. 

So he goes to the city of Columbia, which has the ‚Äòprophet‚Äô, Comstock. Booker gets asked if he wants to be BAPTISED. If he says Yes - he becomes Comstock. If he says No - he becomes Booker.

The idea is that there are infinite universes at one time - and they can exist at the same time. Booker and Comstock exist at the same time.

And because there are infinite universes, there are infinite tests - if you flip a coin, you might once get Heads, and then 999 Tails - but it proves there is an alternate universe.

*The RP*
My idea has been that of course, we know that Time is evidence of many universes / timelines... and so Joel is Booker - where he saves Nekoi, or loses her. Or maybe it‚Äôs where he saves Cat, or loses her. Or maybe it‚Äôs... you get the point. But Joel is Booker.

Originally I thought Violet would be a key part in the timeline - but is Joel the biggest part, even bigger than Time himself? Just a thought lol

name: *Revenge*
desc:
‚ÄúCan you tell me what happened that night, Shiri?‚Äù

_‚ÄùIt was a normal night... well, sort of normal... I had a long shift at the hairdressers and got back late... Amiya - uh, Violet -  was in the living room playing on the Switch but I could smell dinner cooking._

_I went to her and said hi, we hugged and she told me there was a letter on the side - and I thought, great, it‚Äôs bills, or something, who knows... there were actually two;_

_One was from my old friend Jack. I hadn‚Äôt spoke to him in... decades... but he revealed him and Amiya had been speaking for years. So I smiled and sighed a bit - Amiya was still childish and still hid things from me - and this was something she hid particularly well. So I smiled and opened the next one._

_Now it was my time to hide something from her. It was a letter from someone signed TF - or... team flare, I guess it was... and it talked about her and the school and the shooter... and I said nothing to her. I... I wanted to call you... the police... the next day... god, I fucked up...‚Äù_

‚ÄúYou couldn‚Äôt have known back then. It was only a few weeks ago, now, wasn‚Äôt it? Listen, Shiri, we have a lot of hope. We know she‚Äôs alright. We have contact with Team Flare - ‚Äú

_‚ÄùAnd - wait, and you didn‚Äôt tell - ‚Äú_

‚ÄúWe haven‚Äôt told you because we don‚Äôt want you to be upset or want to talk to Amiya. That‚Äôs... something we can‚Äôt risk right now. Listen... we‚Äôve got information about her, alright?

They‚Äôre using her for testing like they always do. I don‚Äôt know why they chose her. Maybe her bravery. Maybe because she embarrassed them. We just... we don‚Äôt know.

We received a letter ourselves. And you shouldn‚Äôt be knowing this.... but it included pictures of Amiya. She‚Äôs okay. She‚Äôs what you would expect but she looks okay... our medical team thinks she‚Äôs alright and she‚Äôs healthy. We‚Äôre sending a team there tomorrow.

And I know this is overstepping... but the letter was signed with this name. I can‚Äôt read the signature - but maybe you can?‚Äù

_‚Äù... Zoe.‚Äù_

name: *Father‚Äôs? Day*
desc:
Amiya, to Sylvia and Victoria:
_Hey girls, as you know today is Father‚Äôs Day! Neither of you have sent messages but it‚Äôs still very early in the morning so I‚Äôll assume you‚Äôll send some soon - and please do, she would love to hear them. She‚Äôs so badly sick at the moment so I‚Äôm taking the day off to care for her, so I guess you don‚Äôt have to see her if you don‚Äôt want. She would love it though! I‚Äôll read out your messages for her, she can‚Äôt focus right now._

Amiya, to Victoria:
_Hi Vicky, as you guys can‚Äôt go out now, maybe you‚Äôd like to take your dad out to the pub or something in a week or so? I think she‚Äôd enjoy that a lot. I know she wants to talk with you and relax quite a lot._

Amiya, to Sylvia:
_Hi, I guess you don‚Äôt have to send something if you don‚Äôt want to. I don‚Äôt really know how you feel about her. Listen, she‚Äôs always cared for me and loved me, and she‚Äôs always cared for you guys and loved you guys too. She‚Äôs always respected me and she‚Äôs always protected me. She‚Äôs kind of my saviour. I wouldn‚Äôt have had you guys without her! So please do send a massage anyway, I‚Äôd love it and so would she. If you want to come over and talk we can today, just take some medicine because it could be infectious, what Shiri has! We can talk, just you and me. I‚Äôd like to show you that I can be the mother you would have liked. But it‚Äôs Father‚Äôs Day, so maybe another time. Have a good day, Sylv ^*^_

name: *Memories (although I think there‚Äôs already one called this)*
desc:
_Interviewer:_ Tell us - on this Christmas Eve, what would you say your favourite memory is?

*Shiri:* I think my best memory is me in bed, with Violet nuzzling her head against my neck, whilst I was watching something on my phone, on Christmas Eve - or it would have to be getting either of the children... I‚Äôve never felt so nervous and so excited in my entire life...

*Violet:* ... I-I‚Äôm a bit afraid to say the wrong thing... a-and I-I really love m-my family but - t-the Christmas we all spent together - Joel, Penny, Sylvie, Vicky - uh, K-Kenny and Cat! Yeah... t-that‚Äôs the best one...

*Kenny:* I‚Äôm not sure... I think I‚Äôm still looking for it - you can bet I‚Äôm in love with Pam but every moment with her is a highlight, it‚Äôs almost impossible...

*Penny:* ... i-it‚Äôs special to me. Alright?

*Cat:* where the hell do I even begin... there‚Äôs too much to talk about... but I‚Äôd say... well... I‚Äôll get back to you...

*Joel:* ... a memory that‚Äôs good?

name: *Love*
desc:
_‚ÄùHow about you live alone for a week then, huh?!‚Äù_

_Day 1:_
I said that to Amiya yesterday. We were arguing about stupid things like always with Sylvia outside the door and... she surprised me. She got angry, grabbed her things and by the time I calmed down and left the bathroom, she was gone. I got a message saying she would be back in a week but nothing else. So now what?

_Day 2:_
I can only imagine what things are like for her. I feel bad for her because she must be struggling but I‚Äôm still annoyed at her. Life is going on very normally at home. The cats are fine. Nothing has changed. They all seem a bit lonely and Kaito in particular seems more aggressive towards me but what did I expect?

My day is normal and nothing has changed. I go to work, I come home, I eat food and then I relax. It‚Äôs all just normal. Sleeping feels normal and showering feels normal. In fact it almost feels... freer. I mean it, I seriously do. It‚Äôs the small things, too. I don‚Äôt even feel the pressure to have sex or anything anymore, and that almost turned me on more than anything. I could just do... whatever I wanted. I almost forgot how that felt!

_Day 3:_
I went to a pub today and just drank. I‚Äôve not done that in years. I feel so good. I feel incredible again. I came home and watched TV until 1AM. Is this what my life used to be? I‚Äôm not saying it‚Äôs better but part of it feels so good again... I can look after myself finally. I went out and did what I wanted to do. I got a new haircut today that I‚Äôve been wanting to get for ages. A new motorbike helmet and a few parts. Everything is suddenly so much faster!

_Day 4:_
So it‚Äôs the weekend tomorrow, and I don‚Äôt imagine it‚Äôll be much different. Well, maybe it will be. Amiya always tried to meet up with the Thompson‚Äôs or the kids and go out somewhere... part of it is because she needs a routine, a schedule, to keep herself busy... but I think she really loves them and enjoys being with them.

I got a text from Victoria saying everything was fine and that Sylvia came home very angry at me. I shouldn‚Äôt have said what I said. I don‚Äôt know if I can fix that now. At least she said Sylvia and Amiya are getting along better again.

I ended up going out with some work friends today. It was Tasha‚Äôs birthday and I, for once, said yes, which I guess surprised everyone. It was actually pretty awesome, and I‚Äôve gotta say I‚Äôm pretty happy to do what I want. 

Something did feel weird though, like something was in the back of my mind... I just couldn‚Äôt put my finger on what.

_Day 5:_ 
I haven‚Äôt been into Sylvia‚Äôs or Vicky‚Äôs bedroom in a few days so I completely forgot to water the plants in there. I guess Amiya did that. And, as I realised, she also usually loads the dishwasher and does the laundry. And she buys new cat food when we run out. So this morning was a lot busier than I expected. It‚Äôs a lot to keep track of at first but maybe I‚Äôll get more used to it.

I have to say though, I am missing her. Last night I got home happy about the day and got straight into bed, but then I just couldn‚Äôt sleep... like it was too cold on half of my body, like I was missing something.

Kaito seems almost upset now so I forced him into bed with me whilst bringing the other two along. They all seem a bit weirded out - although Eliza seems happy to stay with me. I swear, I have to play with Mickey all the time! I never remember him being this intensive!

_Day 6:_ 
I ran out of beer this morning. I don‚Äôt even know how. It‚Äôs always just been full. I guess she does that too.

Now I‚Äôm really starting to miss her. The apartment feels too quiet and too gray without her. All I can do is watch TV and... that‚Äôs really it. The cats like to be out during the day but at night, they come back. When they one of us they like to be near but Kaito didn‚Äôt actually come back until quite late today. I guess he‚Äôs missing her too. So we have something to relate to. 

Fuck, I regret saying what I said. I got so angry and I‚Äôve had my head so far up my own ass... I take care of her a lot. I know that, I won‚Äôt be modest. But I didn‚Äôt realise how much she takes care of me too. How much she does that I just never even noticed. I just want her back now. 

_Day 7:_
I kind of just lay in bed in the morning. I didn‚Äôt really know what to do. I didn‚Äôt want to go out because I didn‚Äôt know where to go, I didn‚Äôt want to watch TV because there was nothing to watch, and I didn‚Äôt want to play any games because... I don‚Äôt. Not really. All the games I‚Äôve seen that are interesting aren‚Äôt really for Amiya - well, a few interest us both but only a few - and I don‚Äôt have the right console to play them. So maybe I should get one...

I was looking up things to buy on my phone when the doorbell rang. It rang earlier in the week and the cats seemed excited but then disappointed to see it was the Dominoes pizza guy.

I got up, not well dressed in pyjamas and opened the door to see a short woman standing in front of me with her head down. She didn‚Äôt say anything and I couldn‚Äôt see any tears or hear any crying. She just... stood there with her suitcase and backpack.

I looked at her then just pulled her close and gave her a genuine hug. One that I meant. One that she could feel. And she knew, because she gave me the same hug back. I could feel her familiar touch and her actions felt so natural to me. She hid her face slowly and mumbled something then looked at me and just said ‚ÄòI‚Äôm sorry.‚Äô

We both needed each other and she said I was right, it was hard to do a week alone. But I admitted the same thing and everything kind of spilled out from me. I didn‚Äôt know what to do without her. I think I made myself sound worse than her.

The plants and the house are back to normal. Everything is clean and feels colourful again. I‚Äôve never seen Kaito so friendly with anyone and also so angry at anyone. I‚Äôm surprised she could control him. Mickey was a little excitable but that‚Äôs to be expected. It was almost weird seeing Amiya with no scratch marks on her arms from him.

At least we know never to try that again.

name: *What Can I Say?*
desc:
_"So, what's your name?"_

Violet - a-although my real name is A-Amiya!

_"Last name?"_ 

U-uh - Thompson!

_"And how old are you?"_

... A-ask Shi...

_"Ask Shi?"_

S-Shiri - uh... She remembers...

_"Ok... So, tell us about yourself."

Ok, uh... I-I'm Violet - oh... I already said this // _*laughs nervously*_ // uh... I... I'm short... I have Violet hair.. That's also short... I guess I'm dating Shi... Which is by far the best thing that's ever happened to me... Aaaand.. Uh... ... We live with Kitty?

_"Kitty?"_

U-uh, her real name is Cat - I think...

'Another girl... Similar conditions. Lives in a bar, I think. I gave her a gift; I told her of her life. I may never be allowed to travel again.'

Tape 22:
'I watched her die. She might as well be dead. And it's all my fault. I killed her. I let her die. This is my fault; this is my fault; this is my fault. I didn't know the car would be there. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.'

Tape 24:
'No no no no no no no no no no'

Tape 25:
'I met a girl again. She had bright pink hair. She was upset. She was vulnerable. She's the start of the butterfly effect. I don't know how it ends; let's hope it's good. Let's hope the teddy protects her, huh?'

Tape 30:
' "... Time...?" Wait, you - oh... shit...! Y-You're not dead... You... You!! Oh... My God... "... What are you talking about...? ... My head hurts..." '

Tape 42:
'I took her on a date today. I took her round the park, through the meadows, and then when she was tired I carried her home where we watched a movie together. I don't know if she's happy. I was at peace. I hope she was happy too.'

Tape 49:
' _And she needs you, this is from Matilda... And she needs you, this is from Matilda..._ '

Tape 58:
'I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed her I killed.'

Tape 58:
'That tape is incorrect. She is alive. Timothy. You have to bring your wife back to consciousness. You may be my brother but I can't help you all the time... And this was too close.'

Tape 60:
'I won't time travel anymore. I can't. I nearly lost her again. I think she's too in love with me but my actions nearly killed her. I've been paying her less and less attention and... She followed me once. And nearly killed herself. She went into shock. This is bad.'

Tape 65:
'She's my wife... And she insisted I tape this. It's been a few years... Maybe she was right to make me tape this... I'll take care of both of them.'

Tape 71:
'She's devastated. I'm devastated. Our child... why...'

Tape 77:
'I promise... She's nearly 7 months old... Soon she'll be born... And she'll be ok... "And what if -" honey... Trust me... I promise you...'

Tape 81:
'Welcome to the world... Pamela.'

name: *An Alternate World*
desc:
He groaned as he was shaken awake by his daughter. With a shaky smile on her face, and her brother standing guard, encouraging her, he turned away - and so all the attention went to his wife, too. Slowly, they got up and went downstairs.

Today, of course, was Christmas. Joel dreaded the morning - sitting around, opening presents, waiting, being woken up... It wasn't for him. Although, there was something about family that he liked.

And family was what he got. His son receded to his girlfriend - his daughter, to his wife - and his two other daughters slowly entered through the front door. Well, there was a third. She was already here. 

Joel sighed as he looked at them with disbelief. All of them... His 4 daughters, his 1 son... Ridiculous. 

They all gathered round the Christmas tree and took a photo before they, one by one, gave him a present. He shrugged it off until he opened the first one.

The first was from his son, Kenny. He had bought a very costly pack of beer, plus bottle opener, plus bottle holder, as well as a tshirt that was plain except for a skull made of bottle caps and wrenches. He smiled a bit slowly.

The next was from his first daughter, Nekoi. She had never really known him to be her Dad. She didn't really want to. But nonetheless, he received two handmade plushies, and a small smile - as well as a big smile from her husband.

The third was from his daughter, Saturn. Now, Saturn didn't know Joel was her dad. Although she suspected it a lot, Mars nor Joel said anything. Saturn gave a card and a small Christmas tree - very small - made of spare parts. It seemed she was interested in the same things as him.

The fourth was from his adopted daughter, Amiya, or as she would always say, Violet. Only he and Amiya's wife could say Amiya. She bought a massive hug as well as lots of drawings, a snow globe, a plushie - the list of small bits goes on. She went overboard, basically.

The final gift was from his daughter, Penny. The one he truly loved. Maybe he didn't show it, and he agreed, he was a shit father. But he did love her. Penny seemed afraid of him but slowly climbed onto his lap and cuddled up, holding a card with a drawing of their family inside. He looked at her and the drawing and slowly wiped a tear forming in his eye.

"Joel, happy? Are you kidding?"
"Well... Penny seems to have touched him."
"We all touched him!! We were on his lap!!"
"We know, Amiya. Don't worry... Wanna help Kitty cooking? I'll come too!"

name: *No Cameras, Please*
desc:
BREAKING NEWS!

A shooting that has occurred within (X/Y) school, located nearby Reading, has officially been stopped with no casualties involved.

The shooter, a man named Benny Vargas, aged 35, was wearing a 'Team Flare' outfit whilst the shooting was occurring. Vargas has had many mental health issues in the past. Team Flare refuse to take responsibility of him, saying only that a statement will be released soon about him.

There were only two injuries during the event. One woman who asks to remain anonymous was overpowered and knocked out upon forced entry into the school. During this fight, she pressed the fire alarm button, causing the school to be evacuated.

Violett Thompson, the other injury, is a staff member at school, working as a Teacher's Assistant and also to help around the school with other problems. She was helping a student evacuate when the Vargas approached them.

Thompson is reported as seeing the shooter but staying calm, quickly evacuating the rest of the class she was helping that day. She then approached Vargas in an attempt to calm him down and held a conversation for over 5 minutes with him, but sustained three injuries in the process, two gunshots and one account of bodily harm that he did physically.

After attacking Thompson, Vargas started his search through the school, but the police had already arrived and pacified him before he could leave the room with Thompson in. She was rushed to ER immediately but is in a stable condition and is on the road to a full recovery.

'Violett truly risked her life for these children. She's done an incredible service for us all. We cannot thank her enough.' The school also says that there will be a commemoration of her and her duties.

The police only have an informal sentence to offer at this time : 'Benny is pending a sentence right now. The expected outcome is a life sentence under psychiatric monitoring. Without Violet, it's expected he would have made it much farther through the school. She is a hero.'

Violett Thompson is the mother of two daughters, both who attended the school at one point. It is believed her sister is the well-known Evelyn Thompson, but she is yet to say anything about the matter. We expect a statement from her in coming days.

name: *Repeat our first meeting*
desc:
After 5 years of studying for my dream job, I quitted it all to see _her_ again.

Now she's standing in front of me. Not close but also not far away. But too far away for me to reach her.

Her red hair looks different but still it shines in the light like rubies. Her body is still as hot and graceful as I imagine. No. It is more than just that. It is too perfect to describe it. Just like her face. And her blue shining eye-...

She looked me. Her eyes in the colour of fire. No smile. Not a single emotion in her face. Then she started walking in my direction.

How will she react?
Will she shout at me?
Will she slap me or even start a fight?
Or... will she be happy to see me again and hug me?

I don't know what to do. My body feels hot and sweaty and I'm getting nervous, shaking a little bit. I waited 5 years and gave up everything to see her again, to touch her skin, to feel her breath, to hear her voice, to smell her perfume.

How should I react? Should I hug her or say something? Or should I just do nothing?

She came closer and closer whilst I kept starring at her. Then I made a decision. I opened my mouth to say something like "Hello Cat" or "I'm back". She was very close to me and I closed my mouth again. Is she going to hug me? I closed my eyes for a small moment and when I opened them, I twitched a lot.

She just walked past me. She ignored me.

"How can I help you?"
"I don't need help. I lived here before. A lot changed."

I forced a smile and looked at the body of this attractive red haired woman.

"If you left, why did you come back?"
"I... uhm... need a full time job."
"A full time job? I can give you work here but... you have to live here"
"T-that's good!! Ehm... I lived her before and had a room next to Cat- Catherine's! Can I have it back...?"

The woman moved off the table and walked behind me.

"Hm... I see... you must be Joel. You can have the room. Catherine told me to change the inside. It might look more like a laboratory than a comfy room but it should be enough for you."
"Okay. I'll find the way. Thank you- uhm..."
"Mars."

She looked at me and smiled.

"Welcome to the Team Flare HQ, Joel."

I went to my room and looked at Cat's. I entered the room and put my stuff down, then I went to Cat's room and knocked.

"Come in."

Her soft but cold voice answered and I opened the door.

"Hey Cat-..."

She starred at me and was close to growl.

"My name is Catherine, not Cat. I would be pleased if you quit calling me Cat."

Now I starred at her. I couldn't believe what she just said.

"I wanted to talk-..."
"Sorry but I've got no time. Please leave my room now."

I obeyed and left her. Left her room.
But then I muttered, before I closed the door:

"Can't we just... repeat our first meeting?"


*'She's like Winter, except all year long'*

After 5 long years, he was finally back.

I walked towards him. Slowly edging closer and closer to him until stopping in front of him, a small distance away. He wasn't far now, close enough to see the emotion in his eyes.

He was inspecting my body. I knew he was but I kept looking at his eyes. Looking at my face, taking everything in. I had tried to keep my character but I looked different at the same time. I had changed.

He looked at me. I didn't smile and I could feel my eyes burn a little. I didn't show anything. I started walking again.

I knew what he was doing. I could see him getting ready for any reaction.
He gave me sad eyes, like he missed me.
He tensed his muscles a bit, to impress me, or to get ready for an attack.
He closed his mouth and tried not to talk, like he was ready for me to scream at him.
He moved an arm up a bit, like he was expecting me to hug him.

His body was sweating and his breathing was off. It had been a long five years, and it seemed he hadn't changed at all.

I felt myself look up a bit as if to ignore him. I was taller now. I had changed my hair several times. Just to try and make myself different from who I was.

A scar on my stomach ached a bit and I could feel him staring at me. He wanted me again. He had made a mistake, he would say, and he was sorry.

He opened his mouth briefly but closed it again, ready for me to say something. Was I always the dominant one? I saw him close his eyes and look a bit scared.

By the time he had opened them, I was gone from his view. I hadn't even shown I knew he was here.

I had excelled to a much higher position now, and even if I did still love him, getting back together would put my job in danger. I wasn't risking that for him. Especially considering he hadn't made an effort to get me back yet.

I had given instructions to remake his room. Make him focus more on work. He had told us a month ago he was coming back. I honestly wasn't surprised. I had expected him to do just that.

After he abandoned me in the flat, I came back here and started working. I tried to make myself forget him. And, over time, I have. He doesn't mean anything to me. Not yet.

I had specifically kept his room 'full', so nobody else would take it. He would want the room next to me. Surely I should give him something back.

I had been in several times myself. Putting the diary on his desk. Leaving him a present on top of it. Putting his plushies back. Remodeling and cleaning. My personal little project. I had also been busy with my free time. Just remodeling my own room to get rid of who I was.

By this point I was at my desk when I heard him knock. I spun round on my chair and responded quietly. I'm not his. He doesn't deserve me. He will know this.

"Come in." 

My voice. It was soft but often had an icy edge to it, and it was the one thing I couldn't change myself. It had naturally grown colder over the years.

I watched the door open slowly and he went to say something but once again, I knew my response. Short and cold. That would send him away.

"Hey Cat-" 

I immediately cut him off. I wasn't just Cat anymore. I was Catherine. People feared calling me Cat by mistake. Maybe he would learn soon.

I tensed a bit and responded slowly. 

"My name is Catherine, not Cat. I would be pleased if you quit calling me Cat."

He looked at me with disbelief and tried to think of things to say, realising I was more different than he expected.

"I-I just wanted to talk-"

"Talk? Sorry. My schedule is full - I have no time. Please leave my room now."

He sensed authority, something I hadn't see a lot of in him before, and he slowly closed the door after leaving.

I only just managed to catch what he said when he left. Something that made me twitch a little. He really was sad now. He really did want to speak to me. Perhaps I'll tell him a time tomorrow where we can talk.

"Can't we just... repeat our first meeting...?"

name: *Rambling*
desc:
To: spriestly@###.com
From: Amiya‚Äôs Therapist

Here‚Äôs the audio of what we spoke about today. There‚Äôs more but it‚Äôs private to her and not about you, so I‚Äôve excluded it.

I think you should listen.

‚Äú _Okay, Amiya, why don‚Äôt we start with... actually, talk to me. You seem bothered today._

(w/o stuttering)
O-of course I‚Äôm bothered... there‚Äôs - it‚Äôs - my life just... it‚Äôs not right, okay? I‚Äôm not happy... and I should be, shouldn‚Äôt I? But... it just sucks...

A year ago I had a good job, a loving wife, two loving daughters - I was so happy... I started taking less anti depressants because they made me more tired and it helped, and I could handle it a bit better...

And then... it all just changed... because of my stupid birthday...

Sylvia hated me more and Vicky doesn‚Äôt talk to us much anymore;
Shiri, I found out, was, and still does, drink and smoke weed pretty much constantly;
My new anti-depressants are weaker so I have to take more so I‚Äôve been more tired and more hungry than ever;
And sometimes I don‚Äôt even see the point in living. That‚Äôs - that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm here.

The one time I found Shiri‚Äôs stupid baggy because Kaito was clawing at it, I tried a bit - smoked a bit - and I... I felt so relaxed for the first time in years... and I told her that this was good and she shouts at me and tell me she was a pedophile....?! How do you... how can you even fix saying that?

It‚Äôs the first time I felt calm in so long... and she doesn‚Äôt even think about it, because it‚Äôs ‚Äòher stuff‚Äô - in our marriage, in our apartment, in which she hides drugs - how can I even trust her? I still love her and I want to trust her but.. how can I?

Does she even love me? She doesn‚Äôt tell me... she never seems interested in me... she nearly never says she loves me, and we don‚Äôt have sex because she doesn‚Äôt want it, she never cuddles me in bed when I‚Äôm napping in the afternoon or asks me how my day was anymore, and I think she only hugs me at night to calm herself down from all the drink and drugs! How - I can‚Äôt live in that relationship any longer! I want to - a-and the problem is, even if I wanted to go, where would I go? She‚Äôs my entire life and now - now I don‚Äôt even know what to say...

I love that woman but... does she even love me? Why won‚Äôt she just show it? Why has everything changed?‚Äù

name: *File Index: 0x0064AC*
desc:
*File Name: Unknown Siren*
*Security Index: DEADLY. DO NOT ENGAGE.*

First sighting was 0237AM at 12/09/REDACTED. 

Subject was seen flickering in and out of being - only captured on Cameras 24A and 24C thanks to their higher framerates. Further research believes subject is capable of reappearing over 60 times a second, but no more than 120.

Research suggests subject is a _SIREN_. DO NOT ENGAGE SUBJECT UNDER ANY CONDITIONS.

Excerpt from [REDACTED FILE]:
_Sirens are women of unknown backgrounds and incredible powers. Sirens can be distinguished by their tattoos identifying them running down half their body.

Only six Sirens can exist at any given time. As of present, only two are known. A third Siren, Steele, was successfully captured but terminated before experimenting could occur.

"From Steele, we learned that the tattoos on their bodies are part of a language. The letters 'S, T, E, L, M and A' have been translated, but no sentences have been successfully translated as it seems to be infinitely complex in terms of grammar. There is a chance the sentences have little to no meaning, or completely new meanings not present in English.

Sirens have mystical abilities, usually including time travel and control of space and matter. Steele seems to have been missing the ability to travel through time, but did show exceptional control over thoughts and minds of those around her. Other sirens have been seen to create miniature black holes, and corrupt electronical equipment."

This is a LEVEL 1 SITUATION. Do not engage and contact HQ Leader upon seeing. Last sighting was 21 weeks from this document being written. Siren seemed to wear a yellow skin-tight suit, although no details of her body could be seen. Suit almost looks impenetrable. Siren has also been seen on one occasion passing by a sleeper HQ in the city of [REDACTED] in a business suit.

Siren has been coined 'Siren M' due to the visibility of the letter M on the side of her yellow skin suit. No tattoo visible so no further classification as of yet. 

Purpose inside city and HQ unknown.

_Notes:_
_If you see her, you're dead. Do not move if seen and do not speak. Treat as an SCP Object until further classification. The more you struggle, the more you will suffer._

_Team Flare TM_
